action_output_list: To change the app language, I need to open the Retro Music app first.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music"}

The current screen shows the settings menu. I need to scroll down to find the language settings.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 8}
